name: Nisos
description:
Nisos is a 2D survival indie game with easy controls and simple aesthetics.

The goal is to make the island to be 100% viable against hazardus climate :

  • Thunder storms
  • Earthquakes
  • Huge waves

Make sure your population is over 0, otherwise your island existence is meaningless.

You can increase your population by increasing your ecosystem :

  • Trees
  •  Corals
  • Barrier islands

Make sure that you have read the ingame controls to make your experience even better.

Credits :

Unity Asset Store
 Nature Sound FX

 BIG5AUDIO UI &  UX Final 44.1 from https://gumroad.com
